faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period for an office space for rent in Sector 2 Faridabad
faqs.answer: The standard commercial lock-in period in Sector 2, similar to other major business hubs in Faridabad, typically ranges between 18 to 36 months, though this is negotiable depending on the building class and the scale of the space being leased. For large corporate floor rentals or bare-shell units requiring significant tenant investment, the landlord may insist on a longer lock-in period to secure their investment return. Conversely, smaller serviced or co-working offices often offer highly flexible terms with shorter lock-in clauses or none at all, catering specifically to dynamic startup requirements.

faqs.question: What are the average maintenance charges for commercial property rentals here
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges for an office space for rent in Sector 2 vary based on the Grade A or B classification of the building and the extent of the services provided. On average, tenants can expect to pay between Rs 10 and Rs 20 per square foot per month. This fee generally covers common area electricity, lift maintenance, centralized HVAC upkeep, professional security services, and common area cleaning. Always confirm precisely which services are included in the CAM charge before finalizing the lease agreement.
